H0.text: Suger Mice was a 1987 single for which British rock band. Genesis

H1.text: Suger Mice was a 1987 single for which British rock band. Def Leppard

H2.text: Suger Mice was a 1987 single for which British rock band. The Police

H3.text: Suger Mice was a 1987 single for which British rock band. Marillon

A4.text: Sugar Mice is a song by British neo-prog band Marillion.

A5.text: It was released as the second single from their fourth studio album, Clutching at Straws (1987).
